posts.content:
Hi all

motivated by the recent thread on the WoG forum, I thought I would share my token Druid/RDD build. The idea is to have a Dragon Shape Druid with all the goodies from Bard 11 (Song+Curse Song+Taunt) and the bonuses from RDD (notably, +8 Strength!)(EDIT: as Yunim says below, the fact that RDD bonuses work when polymorphed is actually not intended and might get fixed soon). I have not tested this because life has other priorities at the moment, but I believe it is viable. Not a power build, but viable. Probably there are a lot of improvements to be made too, so go ahead!
SpoilerDruid(19), Bard(11), Red Dragon Disciple(10), Human, Non-lawful and Neutral DEX: 9 (10) WIS: 17 (30) CHA: 8 (10) Human: (Quick to Master) 02: Bard(1) 04: Druid(3): WIS+1, (WIS=18) 06: Red Dragon Disciple(1): Knockdown 08: Red Dragon Disciple(3): WIS+1, (WIS=19) 10: Red Dragon Disciple(4): (STR=20) 12: Bard(3): WIS+1, Toughness, (WIS=20) 14: Red Dragon Disciple(7): (CON=12) 16: Red Dragon Disciple(8): WIS+1, (WIS=21) 18: Druid(6): Improved Critical: Unarmed 20: Druid(8): WIS+1, (WIS=22) 22: Red Dragon Disciple(10): {Darkvision}, (STR=24), (CHA=10) 24: Druid(10): WIS+1, Great Wisdom I, (WIS=24) 26: Druid(12) 28: Druid(13): WIS+1, (WIS=26) 30: Druid(15): Great Wisdom III, (WIS=27) 32: Druid(17): WIS+1, (WIS=28) 34: Bard(7) 36: Druid(18): WIS+1, Dragon Shape, (WIS=30) 38: Bard(10) 40: Druid(19): DEX+1, (DEX=10) Hitpoints: 382 Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 24/36/18 BAB: 25 AC (naked/mundane items only): 22/33 Alignment Changes: 0 Concentration 42(43), Disable Trap 1(3), Discipline 40(47), Lore 8(21), Open Lock 1(1), Perform 18(18), Spellcraft 28(30), Taunt 42(42), Tumble 40(40), UMD 35(35) 01: Disable Trap(1), Lore(2), Open Lock(1), Save(18),  03: Lore(4), Save(2),  05: Lore(1), Save(12),  07: Discipline(1), Save(15),  09: Perform(3), Taunt(7), Tumble(7), UMD(7),  11: Discipline(1), Save(6),  13: Discipline(1), Save(3),  15: Save(12),  17: Discipline(3), Taunt(5), Tumble(5), UMD(5), Save(4),  19: Concentration(3), Spellcraft(3),  21: Discipline(4),  23: Save(7),  25: Save(21),  27: Discipline(5), Taunt(10), Tumble(10), UMD(10),  29: Concentration(2), Spellcraft(5),  31: Save(10),  33: Discipline(6), Perform(2), Taunt(6), Tumble(5), UMD(5),  35: Concentration(2), Discipline(1), Perform(3), Taunt(1),  37: Discipline(2), Taunt(2), Tumble(5),  39: Concentration(2), Discipline(1), Perform(3), Taunt(1), 
Strengths:
  • Highest possible STR score (56 unbuffed) on a player character :)
  • Full Druid spellcasting (with high WIS score)+Scribe Scrolls
  • Decent AB (+36 ) in human shape, with 3 APR
  • Buffs to AB: +2 outdoors, +2 song, +2 Curse song, up to +6 Taunt. All undispellable.
  • Dragon shape AB: 25 (base) +19 (STR) + 4 (RDD bonus STR) + 6 (cap STR) +6 (enhancement on claws) -2 (size) = 58, very respectable, goes up to 70 with all the above (68 indoors)
  • UMD anything
  • Green Dragon shape is immune to acid AND fire, for those pesky damage shielded mages
Weaknesses:
  • Lowish HP
  • Lowish Fortitude and Reflex saves
  • Only 3 APR
  • Matures late in both Druid and Bard (and gets Dragon Shape only at 36)
  • No room for Song feats, but the feats are easy to tweak and suit to the environment
Let me know what you think!
Cheers

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content: Not trying to discourage this build, but it's worth mentioning that the RDD polymorph bug will probably be fixed in EE v8193.18. [https://github.com/Beamdog/nwn-issues/issues/185]

posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content:
Yunim wrote:Not trying to discourage this build, but it's worth mentioning that the RDD polymorph bug will probably be fixed in EE v8193.18. [https://github.com/Beamdog/nwn-issues/issues/185]
Thanks! I was not aware, I was not even aware it was a bug.
Definitely worth mentioning, as the build makes little sense without the extra stats (it works, but the choice of going RDD is hard to justify). Makes me feel bad as I posted a build aimed at exploiting a bug in the game :)
